Direct message the job poster from Harnham
Emma Spagnola
Recruitment Consultant - Data Science (Phoenix) at Harnham
Do you have data science experience working on marketing and operations projects and are seeking a new fully remote position? Our client is looking for a Director of Data Science, and the role comes with an attractive salary and benefits package. To give you an idea of how this flexible role would look and feel, here are some of the things you could expect to do:Segmentation work on the consumer side Building clustering, logistic/linear regression, random forest, and A/B testing algorithmsPerforming problem statements, structure analysis to support, and present to stakeholdersLead a small team of 3-5 data scientists Working in an environment with weekly analysis cycles To apply for this Director of Data Science role, you will need 5 years experience leading teams. You will also require knowledge of the following:SQL – need to query a databaseStatistical methods – predictive modelsRegression and linear analysisPythonStrong communication and leadership abilities In return for your knowledge and expertise, you will receive a favourable salary and benefits package of $155,000-$170,000 plus bonus.To apply for this Director of Data Science job, please contact Emma Spagnola today.
